response.original_title: Binding Together A Thousand Fibers through Fair Trade
response.overview: Buying Fair Trade is a conscious choice. When consumers choose it, they often understand the basics of Fair Trade and are aware of the varous parts of the supply chain, including the essential -- yet generally overlooked -- role of the person who produces the product.  Partners for Just Trade brings you this film that explores the principles of Fair Trade based on real life experiences. Filmed in both Peru and the United States, this documentary bridges the gap between consumers and producers and helps viewers understand why Fair Trade is an important -- and viable -- way to do business.
